snippet.title: RoadCraft - Gameplay Overview Trailer
snippet.description:
Pre-order now here: https://community.focus-entmt.com/focus-entertainment/roadcraft?utm_campaign=RC_GameplayOverview&utm_medium=post&utm_source=YouTube#buy

Disasters won’t wait, will you?

With 8 vast maps to explore, take control of heavy machinery and rebuild industries in devastated regions. Experience advanced real-time physics as you manage resources, tackle challenges, and reshape the aftermath.

Plus, team up with up to 4 players in co-op to rebuild together.
